verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and to the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2127>blessed<s%> us with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G2129>blessings<s%> in <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places in <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G2531>According<s%> as he has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> us in him <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that we should be <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G299>without<s%> <S%G299>blame<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> him in <S%G26>love:<s%>

Having <S%G4309>predestinated<s%> us to the <S%G5206>adoption<s%> of <S%G5206>children<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G848>himself,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the good <S%G2107>pleasure<s%> of his <S%G2307>will,<s%>
To the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of his <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> he has <S%G5487>made<s%> us <S%G5487>accepted<s%> in the <S%G25>beloved.<s%>

In <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G629>redemption<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> his <S%G129>blood,<s%> the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G3900>sins,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of his <S%G5485>grace;<s%>
<S%G3757>Wherein<s%> he has <S%G4052>abounded<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> us in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G5428>prudence;<s%>

Having <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to us the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of his <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his good <S%G2107>pleasure<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G4388>purposed<s%> in <S%G848>himself:<s%>

That in the <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G2540>times<s%> he might <S%G346>gather<s%> <S%G346>together<s%> in one <S%G3956>all<s%> things in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth;<s%> even in him:

In <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2820>obtained<s%> an <S%G2820>inheritance,<s%> being <S%G4309>predestinated<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of him who <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G2307>will:<s%>
That we should be to the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4276>first<s%> <S%G4276>trusted<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

In <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> trusted, after that you <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4991>salvation:<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> after that you <S%G4100>believed,<s%> you were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> with that <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> is the <S%G728>earnest<s%> of our <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1519>until<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of the <S%G4047>purchased<s%> <S%G4047>possession,<s%> to the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

<S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G2504>also,<s%> after I <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints,<s%>
<S%G3973>Cease<s%> not to give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> for you, <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you in my <S%G4335>prayers;<s%>

That the <S%G2316>God<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G1391>glory,<s%> may <S%G1325>give<s%> to you the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G602>revelation<s%> in the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of him:

The <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>understanding<s%> being <S%G5461>enlightened;<s%> that you may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of his <S%G2821>calling,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of his <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> in the <S%G40>saints,<s%>

And <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G3174>greatness<s%> of his <S%G1411>power<s%> to <S%G1519>us-ward<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1753>working<s%> of his <S%G2479>mighty<s%> <S%G2904>power,<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> he <S%G1754>worked<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> when he <S%G1453>raised<s%> him from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G2523>set<s%> him <S%G1722>at<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> hand in the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places,

<S%G5231>Far<s%> <S%G5231>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G746>principality,<s%> and <S%G1849>power,<s%> and <S%G1411>might,<s%> and <S%G2963>dominion,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> that is <S%G3687>named,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in that which is to <S%G3195>come:<s%>

And has <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G5259>under<s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> him to be the <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G5228>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to the <S%G1577>church,<s%>
<S%G3748>Which<s%> is his <S%G4983>body,<s%> the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of him that <S%G4137>fills<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G3956>all.<s%>
